# Essential Resources for Functional Trait and Tropical Homegarden Research

## üß∞ Tools and Software for Data Extraction and Meta-Analysis

- **`metafor` (Viechtbauer, 2010)** ‚Äî Flexible R package for conducting meta-analyses.

- **`metagear` (Lajeunesse, 2016)** ‚Äî Facilitates systematic review workflows and meta-analyses in R.

- **`revtools` (Westgate, 2019)** ‚Äî Efficient article screening and deduplication for literature reviews.

- **`metaDigitise` (Pick et al., 2019)** ‚Äî Extract quantitative data from figures in publications.  
  _Methods in Ecology & Evolution_, [doi](https://doi.org/10.1111/2041-210X.13118)
